Song.title: How Majestic
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge Â© 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Bb | Bb | F | C | Bb | Bb | F | Csus |]
Verse 1: When I [Bb]see the stars in [Dm]heaven You have [Bb]flung a[F]cross the [Bb]sky What is [Bb]man that You should [Dm]love him Or that [Bb]he should [F]catch Your [Bb]eye? Yet You [Gm]sent Your Son to [Eb]die That [F]we might come to [Bb]find Our [Eb]life in [C7]Him
Chorus: O [F]Lord, our [C]Lord How ma[Gm]jestic is Your [Dm]name Ma[Bb]jestic is Your [F]name in all the [C]earth O [F]Lord, our [C]Lord How ma[Gm]jestic is Your [Dm]name Ma[Bb]jestic is Your [F]name in all the [C]earth In all the [C Dm C Dm C Dm]earth, [ ]in [C C]all [ ]the [F G F G F G]earth
Verse 2: You are [Bb]awesome in Your [Dm]glory We are [Bb]sinful [F]and imp[Bb]ure How can [Bb]we approach the [Dm]Holy Who will [Bb]not one [F]sin end[Bb]ure? Yet You [Gm]sent Your Son to [Eb]die His [F]blood has paid the pr[Bb]ice For [Eb]all our [C7]sin
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 when i see the stars in heaven you have flung across the sky what is man that you should love him or that he should catch your eye yet you sent your son to die that we might come to find our life in him chorus o lord our lord how majestic is your name majestic is your name in all the earth o lord our lord how majestic is your name majestic is your name in all the earth in all the earth in all the earth verse 2 you are awesome in your glory we are sinful and impure how can we approach the holy who will not one sin endure yet you sent your son to die his blood has paid the price for all our sin
